title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Stranger Things
description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments and supernatural forces.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the dangers of the criminal underworld.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Witcher
description: A solitary monster hunter struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

title: The Mandalorian
description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham with the help of allies.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families wage war against each other in order to gain control over the mythical land of Westeros.
